action.action-desc: Mr. Ruiz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To provide funding for LIHEAP during a Federal Government shutdown.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Home Energy Assistance in Times of Shutdown Act or the HEATS Act.

section.header: Funding for LIHEAP during a Federal Government shutdown
section.text: Out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, there is appropriated such sums as are necessary to pay, during any period of a lapse in discretionary appropriations during any fiscal year, for making payments under section 2602(b) of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 (42 U.S.C. 8621(b)) during such lapse.
